channel.title: [URGENT]Restoring Special Attack Faster And Upon Death [URGENT]
channel.description:
When people on my server die, they're Special Attack doesn't restore.
Also, after using the Special Attack, it takes AGES to restore.
If anyone can help with both of these problems, or just one PLEASE help me out :)

item.title: [URGENT]Restoring Special Attack Faster And Upon Death [URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

What about making it restore faster?

EDIT: I think I got it

Thansk for help but

Read full topic

item.title: [URGENT]Restoring Special Attack Faster And Upon Death [URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @The_Portal The Portal
item.description:
@The_Portal wrote:

Just go into the death method and apply: specialAmount == 100;

Not that hard, but it depends on what your method is for the special bar regain and etc.

Read full topic
item.source: [URGENT]Restoring Special Attack Faster And Upon Death [URGENT]
